task: Input: Xenium FFPE Human Breast Cancer data from outs.zip. Load the data using scanpy, perform one-vs-all t-test_overestim_var differential expression per cluster (logFC > 0, adj p ≤ 0.05, use_raw=False), rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj), convert to uppercase gene symbols, identify clusters expressing cancer-associated fibroblast (CAF) markers (VIM, COL1A1, COL1A2, FAP, ACTA2), and return all the combined CAF marker genes from those fibroblast clusters as cell_types_predicted.

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.36 (≥80% overlap with 5 GT markers using top-10).
